name: Nico Robin
text: Banish (When a character deals damage, the target card is trashed without activating its Trigger.) When Attacking: You may trash one card with a Trigger from your hand : Add up to one DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as rested.

effect.text: When a character deals damage, the target card is trashed without activating its Trigger.
You may trash one card with a Trigger from your hand : Add up to one DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as rested.
